name: Ollpheist High
description:
Cameron Mohann is new to Ollpheist High School after finally getting all the gender change related paperwork sorted to move from a co-ed to an all girl's school. But as it turns out, the problems don't end there! There is an annual Boy's School x Girl's School Senior Dance coming up, and now Cameron needs to find a date! 

When you're the new girl in school, the possibilities are endless -- will she find romance in time for the big dance?

  • Choose between multiple monster girls!
  • 5 different endings!
  • Compatible with PC, Mac, and Linux!
  • Completely free to play!

Made for the 2017 Yuri Jam!
